>
[First Revelation](/Feats.aspx?ID=6220) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 180 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Oracle](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=233)

**Prerequisites**
[Oracle Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6217)

</column>

---

You gain your mystery’s initial revelation spell. If you don’t have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can [Refocus](/Actions.aspx?ID=2621) by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your cursebound value by 1.
